# Large Document with Multiple Diagrams

This document tests handling of larger files with many diagram blocks.

## Section 1: User Flow

+----------------------+
| User Registration|
| - Enter email|
| - Set password       |
| - Verify account|
+----------------------+

Some explanatory text about the registration process.

## Section 2: Authentication

┌──────────────────────┐
│ Login Flow│
│ 1. Check credentials │
│ 2. Generate token│
│ 3. Set session│
└──────────────────────┘

More text describing authentication.

## Section 3: Data Processing

╔══════════════════════╗
║ Data Pipeline║
║ Extract → Transform  ║
║ → Load into DB║
╚══════════════════════╝

Explanation of the ETL process.

## Section 4: API Endpoints

+----------+     +------------+     +----------+
| Client|  →  | API Gateway|  →  | Backend|
+----------+     +------------+     +----------+

The client communicates through the gateway.

## Section 5: Database Schema

┌────────────────┐     ┌────────────────┐
│ Users Table│     │ Orders Table│
│ - id           │     │ - id           │
│ - email│     │ - user_id│
│ - created_at   │     │ - total│
└────────────────┘     └────────────────┘

Schema description continues here.

╭──────────────────╮
│ Metrics│

Monitoring setup details.

## Section 7: Deployment

+------------------+
| Production│
| - 3 app servers  |
| - 2 DB replicas│
| - 1 cache node│
+------------------+

Deployment architecture.

┌────────────────────┐
│ Error Types│
│ - Validation       │
│ - Authentication│
│ - Authorization│
│ - Server Error│
└────────────────────┘

How errors are handled.

╚════════════════════╝

Caching explanation.

## Section 10: Security

+--------------------+
| Security Measures|
| - Rate limiting    |
| - Input validation|
| - HTTPS only       |
| - JWT tokens|
+--------------------+

Security best practices.

## Conclusion

This document demonstrated multiple diagram types across 100+ lines.
